name: PriceWell Subscription Billing for Stripe
author: PriceWell

sections.description:
Easily integrate Stripe subscriptions with WordPress using the PriceWell plugin.

Getting Started

  • Install this plugin
  • Create a PriceWell account at pricewell.io and connect your Stripe account
  • Create a Pricing Page or Customer Portal in PriceWell
  • Insert a shortcode into your WordPress page to embed a Pricing Page or Customer Portal

Shortcodes

Embed a Pricing Page

[pricewell_pricing_page page_id="YOUR_PAGE_ID_HERE"]

Embed a Customer Portal

[pricewell_customer_portal portal_id="YOUR_PORTAL_ID_HERE"]
sections.installation:
STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
Log in to your WordPress dashboard (e.g. yourdomain.com/wp-admin).
Click on the “Plugins” tab in the left-hand side, then click “Add New”.
Search for “PriceWell” and find the plugin.
Install it by clicking the “Install Now” link.
When installation finishes, click “Activate Plugin”.

Further documentation is available here
sections.faq:
Which countries are supported?

Stripe supported country. Go here to see if Stripe is available in your country.

Do I need to have a PriceWell account?

Yes, the plugin is there to connect your wordpress with your Billflow account. You can sign up here.

Can I change the style of these pages?

Yes you can, check out our docs here to learn more about styling these pages here.

Where is the documentation for the plugin?

Join us here, and feel free to message us on our website with any questions.

short_description: Build Stripe Subscriptions into your WordPress site in minutes. Pricing Pages, checkout and subscription management.
